amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to comprehensive mental health reform.

vote.text: Amendment SA 713 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 713 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Murphy. (consideration: CR S1998; text: CR S1998) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to comprehensive mental health reform.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 713 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 713 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Murphy.
